titles.title: PAW Act of 2024
PAW Act of 2024
People and Animals Well-being Act of 2024

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain veterinary expenses for pets and service animals to be treated as amounts paid for medical care for purposes of a health savings account or flexible savings account.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
People and Animals Well-being Act of 2024 or the PAW Act of 2024
This bill treats amounts paid for veterinary care or a pet health insurance plan of a service animal as medical care for purposes of the tax deduction for medical expenses.
